description: det(P*Q)/n! where P, Q are n X n matrices with P[i,j]=lcm(i,j), Q[i,j]=gcd(i,j).
links: Enrique PÃ©rez Herrero, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100
prog: (Sage)def A060239(n):....P = Matrix(lambda i,j: lcm(i+1,j+1), nrows=n)....Q = Matrix(lambda i,j: gcd(i+1,j+1), nrows=n)....return (P*Q).det()/factorial(n) # [D. S. McNeil, Jan 16 2011]
author: MCKAY john (mckay(AT)cs.concordia.ca), Mar 21 2001
